thread.title: USA TODAY Sports' NBA triple-double tracker
thread.title_full: USA TODAY Sports' NBA triple-double tracker

author: USA TODAY Sports
title: USA TODAY Sports' NBA triple-double tracker
text:
USA TODAY Sports' NBA triple-double tracker Did Russell Westbrook have another triple-double last night? Probably. Post to Facebook USA TODAY Sports' NBA triple-double tracker Did Russell Westbrook have another triple-double last night? Probably.  //usat.ly/2gzM9R6   2   USA TODAY Sports' NBA triple-double tracker AJ Neuharth-Keusch , USA TODAY Sports Published 1:10 p.m. ET Dec. 3, 2016 | Updated 6:38 p.m. ET Jan. 29, 2017 CLOSE x Share USA TODAY Sports' AJ Neuharth-Keusch gives us the top three most clutch players in the NBA. Oklahoma City Thunder guard Russell Westbrook (0) reacts after a play against the Detroit Pistons during the second quarter at Chesapeake Energy Arena. (Photo: Mark D. Smith, USAT) 
There's a triple-double revolution sweeping the NBA this season, and Russell Westbrook is leading the charge. But he's hardly the only player taking part in the festivities. 
We'll be following along every step of the way, keeping you up-to-date on all of the stat-stuffing performances throughout the league. 
Note: Each capsule links back to an original game story. All stats courtesy of NBA.com . League total: 59 A link has been posted to your Facebook feed. 59. Russell Westbrook (Jan. 29 vs. Cavs) - 20 points, 12 rebounds, 10 assists Ken Blaze-USA TODAY Sports 58. James Harden (Jan. 27 vs. 76ers) - 51 points, 13 rebounds, 13 assists.
